tool_description: This API uses deep learning to analyze the sentiment of pieces of text.
name: Sentiment Analyzer
title: Sentiment Analyzer

api_list.name: Sentiment Analyzer
api_list.description: Analyze the sentiment of text using deep learning.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://sentiment-analyzer2.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sentiment-analyzer2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://sentiment-analyzer2.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sentiment-analyzer2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
